Verses: 1 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 ippodhum Manupuththirane, Raththanchindhina Nagaraththukkaaga Nee Vazhakkaaduvaayo? Vazhakkaada Manadhaanaal, Nee Adhin Aruvaruppugalaiyellaam Adharkuth Theriyakkaatti,

3 adhai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Unkaalam Varaththakkadhaaga Un Naduvile Ranththanchindhugiradhum, Unnaith Theettuppaduththaththakkadhaaga Unakke Virodhamaai Naragalaana Vikkiragangalai Undupannugiradhumaana Nagarame,

4 nee Sindhina Un Raththaththinaal Nee Kutranchumandhadhaagi, Nee Undupannina Un Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaal Nee Theettuppattu, Un Naatkalai Sameebikkappanni, Un Varushangalai Niraivetrinaai; Aagaiyaal Naan Unnaip Purajaadhigalukku Nindhaiyaagavum, Dhesangalukkellaam Pariyaasamaagavum Vaippen.
5 unakku Sameebamum Unakku Dhooramumaana Dhesangalin Manushar Nee Avakeerththiyulladhendrum, Amali Peruththadhendrum Unnaip Pariyaasampannuvaargal.
6 idho, Isravelin Adhipadhigalil Avaravar Thangal Puyabalaththukkuth Thakkadhaaga, Unnil Raththanchindhinaargal.
7 unnilulla Thaai Thagappanai Arpamaai Enninaargal; Un Naduvil Paradhesikku Idukkan Seydhaargal; Unakkul Thikkatravanaiyum Vidhavaiyaiyum Odukkinaargal.
8 nee En Parisuththa Vasthukkalai Asattaipanni, En Oivunaatkalai Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkinaai.
9 raththanchindhumpadikku Abaandam Pesugiravargal Unnidaththil Irukkiraargal; Malaigalinmel Saappidugiravargalum Unnidaththil Irukkiraargal; Muraikedu Seygiravargal Un Naduvil Irukkiraargal.
10 thagappanai Nirvaanamaakkinavargal Unnil Irukkiraargal; Dhoorasthreeyai Balavandhappaduththinavargal Unnil Irukkiraargal.

11 unnil Oruvan Than Ayalaanudaiya Manaiviyode Aruvaruppaanadhai Seygiraan; Veroruvan Muraikedaaith Than Marumagalaith Theettuppaduththugiraan; Veroruvan Than Thagappanukkup Pirandha Than Sagodhariyai Balavandhampannugiraan.

12 raththansindhumpadikkup Paridhaanamvaanginavargal Unnil Irukkiraargal; Nee Vattiyaiyum Polisaiyaiyum Vaangi, Porulaasaiyinaal Un Ayalaanukku Idukkan Seydhu, Ennai Marandhu Ponaai Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
13 idho, Nee Aniyaayamaai Sambaadhiththa Porulinimiththamum, Un Naduvil Nee Sindhina Raththaththinimiththamum Naan Kaikottugiren.
14 naan Unnil Nyaayancheyyum Naatkalil Un Irudhayam Thaangumo? Appozhudhu Un Kaigal Thidamaayirukkumo? Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen, Idhai Niraivetruven.
15 naan Unnaip Purajaadhigalukkulle Sidharadiththu, Unnai Dhesangalile Thootri, Un Asuththaththai Unnil Ozhiyappannuven.
16 nee Purajaadhigalin Kangalukku Munbaagap Parisuththak Kulaichchalaayirundhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaai Endru Sol Endraar.
17 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
18 manupuththirane, Isravel Vamsaththaar Enakkuk Kalimbaaip Ponaargal; Avargalellaarum Kugaiyilulla Piththalaiyum Thagaramum Irumbum Eeyamumaayirukkiraargal; Avargal Velliyin Kalimbaaip Ponaargal.
19 aadhalaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Ellaarum Kalimbaaip Ponapadiyinaal, Idho, Naan Ungalai Erusalemukkul Serppen.

20 velliyaiyum Piththalaiyaiyum Irumbaiyum Eeyaththaiyum Thagaraththaiyum Akkiniyil Oodhi Urukkuvadharkaagak Kugaikkul Serkkiradhupola, Naan En Kobaththinaalum En Ukkiraththinaalum Ungalai Serththuvaiththu Urukkuven.
21 naan Ungalaik Kootti, En Kobamaagiya Akkiniyai Ungalmel Oodhuven; Adharkulle Neengal Uruguveergal.
22 kugaikkul Velli Urugumaappola, Neengal Adharkul Uruguveergal; Appozhudhu Karththaraagiya Naan En Ukkiraththai Ungalmel Ootrivitten Endru Arindhukolveergal Endraar.
23 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
24 manupuththirane, Nee Dhesaththaippaarththu; Nee Suththampannappadaadhadhesam, Kobaththin Kaalaththil Mazhaipeyyaadha Dhesam Endru Adharku Sollu.

25 adhilulla Theerkkadharisigal Adhin Naduvil Kattuppaadu Pannugiraargal; Gerchchikkira Singam Irai Kavvugiradhupola, Aaththumaakkalai Avargal Patchikkiraargal; Dhiraviyaththai Vilaiyuyarndha Porulgalaiyum Vaangikkollugiraargal; Adhin Naduvil Anegarai Vidhavaigalaakkugiraargal.

26 adhin Aasaariyargal En Vedhaththukku Aniyaayancheydhu, En Parisuththavasthukkalaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkugiraargal; Parisuththamulladharkum Parisuththamillaadhadharkum Viththiyaasampannaamalum, Asuththamulladharkum Asuththamillaadhadharkum Undaana Vetrumaiyaik Kaanbiyaamalum Irundhu, En Oivunaatkalukkuth Thangal Kangalai Moodikkollugiraargal; Avargal Naduvile Naan Ganaveenampannappadugiren.
27 adhin Naduvil Irukkira Adhin Prabukkal Irai Kavvugira Onaaigalaippol Irukkiraargal; Aniyaayamaaip Porul Sambaadhikkiradharku Raththanchindhugiraargal, Aaththumaakkalaik Kollaiyidugiraargal.

28 adhin Theerkkadharisigal Abaththamaanadhai Dharisiththu, Poisaasthiraththai Avargalukku Solli, Karththar Uraikkaadhirundhum, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraiththaarendru Solli, Avargalukku Saaramatra Saandhaip Poosugiraargal.
29 dhesaththin Janangal Idukkanseydhu, Kollaiyadiththu, Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanai Odukki, Anniyanai Aniyaayamaaith Thunbappaduththugiraargal.
30 naan Dhesaththai Azhikkaadhapadikkuth Thirappile Nirkavum Suvarai Adaikkavunthakkadhaaga Oru Manushanaith Thedinen, Oruvanaiyum Kaanen.

31 aagaiyaal, Naan Avargalmel En Kobaththai Ootri, En Moorkkaththin Akkiniyaal Avargalai Nirmoolamaakki, Avargaludaiya Vazhiyin Palanai Avargal Thalaiyinmel Sumarappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endraar.
